package.name: acdk_sql
package.title: ACDK SQL (acdk_sql)
package.shortdescription: acdk_sql contains the specification for JDBC-like interface to SQL databases.
package.description:
acdk_sql contains the driver model, which is quite similar to the JDBC interface.
The following database drivers are available:
%ref[acdk_sql_sqlite, acdk_sql_sqlite] contains a small, ready to use, embedded SQL database.
%ref[ODBC Bridge, acdk_sql_odbc]:
all databases with an ODBC interface on Windows. Tested with MS SQL 2000, MS Access, Oracle 9 and postgreSQL.
mySQL and postgreSQL under Linux over the libODBC/unixODBC library.
Oracle under Solaris aover the libODBC/unixODBC library.
acdk_sql is only a interface library. An implementation of acdk_sql library for ODBC can be found in %ref[acdk_sql_odbc]. This package also provides %ref[detailed documentation, acdk_sql_man].
